name: astro-example
description: - make sure to have nodejs installed on your system `node -v` to see what version you have installed (> 16 hopefully) - Open folder in vs code - Add Astro vs code extension https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=astro-build.astro-vscode - Initialize Astro project https://docs.astro.build/en/getting-started/  `npm create astro@latest` and go through cli wizard - Add react  `npx astro add react` - Add tailwind  `npx astro add tailwind` - Axios https://axios-http.com/  `npm install axios` ## Other Nice To Haves - Add daisyui (pick theme and add it) https://daisyui.com/  `npm install daisyui` - Add mobx ("useDefineForClassFields": true in tsconfig.json) `npm install mobx mobx-react`
